attributes.background: Help stop the Incinerator being built in Whitehill Hamilton and stop the disease cancer being affected by 1 in 3 people

rejection.details:
Planning issues are devolved in Scotland. That means that your petition is about something that the Scottish Government and the Scottish Parliament are responsible for. The UK Government and Parliament therefore can't look into this issue.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
